name: Photoshop Scripting Plug-in
summary: Learn about .8LI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: 8LI plugins should be placed in the Adobe Photoshop/Plug-ins/Adobe Photoshop Only/Automate folder in order to be recognized by the program. They can be accessed within Photoshop by selecting "Fileâ†’Automate..." and choosing the appropriate action.

description: Photoshop plugin file that adds additional automation features to Photoshop; may add general scripting support (i.e. ScriptListener.8li and ScriptingSupport.8li) or may add a specific automated action, such as creating a Web Contact Sheet (WebContactSheet.8li).
